That lead me to dig through the wcsaxes (because the plots are not correct) I have learnt how to plot and ...READ MORE...

item.title: How I got selected in GSoC 2017 and the IRISPy Project.
item.dc:creator: Ankit Baruah
item.description: I know I should have written earlier but anyway, here is my story (bear with me). I tried getting into the program last year (2016). I started contributing in late February, it was overwhelming for me at that time. So, I gave up. But the interactions I had with the Sunpy community in IRC were very n ...READ MORE...
